title: Game bug made me lose 40 lp and more!
body: SOOOOOOOOOOO RIOT GUESS WHOS MAD ATM! GUESS WHAT? ITS ME. IM KINDA UPSET. anyways i got this great bug today. it made me unable to trade champs and made my league crash and bc of that my team did a remake. now this happened TWO times in a row and now i got an LB. its not my teams fault that i had a bug and nor do i thinks its mine or even riots but it just sucks that i lost 40 lp for nothing and now i got an LB. so thats all.

replies.body: thank you for your time broporo. it seams to have been fixed now ( i hope XD), but when patch 7.13 ( the one we are on atm i think) came out ive seen/ heard alot of crashes, now i could be wroung but oh well.but thank you for your time <3

Yea that really sucks that you've lost that much LP due to your client crashing. There's not much I can do about the LP, but think of that LPQ as a cry for help. Your client must have some damaged or corrupted files if it's crashing like that, so I'd really suggest running a quick repair through the client options to make sure everything is running properly.
